channel.title: Core
channel.description: Now that we use Core is all the hawk data gone. So we cant roll back anything form before update. Also How long does Core save info for?

item.title: Core
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That’s right, I mentioned the problem here:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:439177”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=541878.msg3974724#msg3974724 date=1334518595]

It has nothing to do with how fast we update

How so?
[/quote]

Because we have plugins we have to wait for regardless.

Anyhow, I don’t know what to do about hawkeye. I can change versions, but there is no ‘importer’ so all the hawkeye data will be lost. (so if someone griefed you an hour ago, you can’t roll it back).

Any suggestions?[/quote]

I do still have the data, and, if it works, I can enable hawkeye to roll back specific things.

Currently I believe Core saves the data forever, which I don’t much like.

Read full topic
